words.example: Having a ticket will allow you to enter the show.
He announced to everyone his new idea for the company.
The two brothers stood beside each other.
It was a challenge to climb to the top of the mountain.

words.definition: to say that something is true
words.example: He claimed to know why the country's laws were weak.

words.definition: the state that someone or something is in
words.example: The patient's condition was very good.

words.definition: to do something to make it successful
words.example: We decided to contribute money to the new hospital.

words.definition: a way something is not like other things
words.example: The biggest difference between the birds is the color of their feathers.

words.definition: to make something into smaller parts
words.example: We divided the pizza.

words.definition: someone who is very good at doing something
words.example: The wizard was an expert at magic.
The Eiffel Tower in Paris is very famous.
He used all his force to try and open the door.
A hot iron can cause great harm if you are not careful.

words.definition: to put in a horizontal or flat position
words.example: Don't lay your socks on the floor.
A white dove is a symbol for peace.
The prince and the princess were married.

words.definition: to stop someone from getting hurt
words.example: Firemen protect us from fires.

words.definition: to know about something without being told
words.example: I could sense that he was watching me.
He felt a sudden pain in his chest.
He is fat. Therefore, he will go on a diet.
